Articles.Content:
As you may already know, Kerbal Stuff has closed down. The domain is no more. This doesn't mean that the content has vanished, though, because a site called Spacedock.info has taken all the code and put it on themselves to host, run, and display all that Kerbalstuff once had. This isn't an old-friend-died-now-replaced-too-soon type deal, it's a group that picked up the pieces left behind by someone who no longer wanted to devote his time and effort to the mod site. He let them take it, and now that's what it is.

If you ask me, this isn't a bad thing. It allows all the old and abandoned mods to get cleared out, and new ones to take their place. It's a fresh start for the community. It's the same, yet new. It's up to you and me to treat it like KSP community family, so let's give it a warm welcome:

SpaceDock.info
Please stop making new threads about the Kerbal Stuff thing, folks. There is already a thread for the recovery project here.
